Title: The Borden Line with Bill Borden | Turning AI Vision into Impact in UK Financial Services
Author: Microsoft Cloud
Description:
Join Bill Borden, Corporate Vice President of Worldwide Financial Services at Microsoft, for a special UK edition of The Borden Line. In this episode, recorded in London during Microsoft’s AI Tour, Bill is joined by Lyndon Subroyen, CTO at Investec, and Theo Michalopoulos, General Manager, Financial Services, Microsoft UK. Together, they explore how generative AI is transforming financial services—from productivity and innovation to culture and compliance.

Lyndon shares Investec’s journey toward building a digitally augmented organization, complete with “bionic bankers” and a unique “blueberry muffin” approach to embedding AI. Theo offers a broader UK market perspective, highlighting real-world use cases, change management strategies, and the importance of skilling to reduce fear and unlock innovation.

Whether you're navigating AI adoption or looking to accelerate your transformation, this episode is packed with insights, practical examples, and a touch of fun.
